statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Meeting studied measures to boost venture capital industry development, heard report on grain production and agricultural work, reviewed regulations on martyrs commendation and export control of dual-use items

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: Meeting with South Korean parliamentarians delegation
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China and ROK should be good neighbors with mutual trust and good partners undertaking mutually beneficial cooperation, noting continuity and stability of China's policy toward ROK. China willing to study measures to facilitate personnel exchange and expand comprehensive cooperation, work together to safeguard free trade principles and maintain stable production and supply chains

statements.speaker: He Lifeng
statements.speaker_title: Official (likely Vice Premier/State Councilor based on context)
statements.context: Phone call with British Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China ready to work with Britain to implement important consensus reached by leaders, restart China-UK Economic and Financial Dialogue, strengthen alignment of development strategies, promote trade and investment liberalization, expand cooperation in finance, green economy, biomedicine and artificial intelligence

statements.speaker: Liu Jianchao
statements.context: Meeting with Maldivian delegation led by Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China willing to work with Maldives to implement consensus reached by heads of state, adhere to mutual respect, strengthen political dialogue, deepen practical cooperation, jointly promote regional development and Global South prosperity. CPC maintains friendly exchanges with major Maldivian political parties and willing to deepen political dialogue and governance experience exchanges

statements.speaker: Lin Jian
statements.context: Regular press briefing
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: U.S. arms sales to Taiwan seriously violate the one-China principle and three China-U.S. joint communiques, especially the August 17 Communique of 1982; violate China's sovereignty and security interests; damage China-U.S. relations and cross-strait peace and stability; send erroneous signal to 'Taiwan independence' separatist forces. China strongly condemns and firmly opposes, has lodged stern representations, and imposed sanctions on nine U.S. military companies. U.S. continues to arm Taiwan, supporting DPP authorities in pursuit of 'Taiwan independence'. Greatest threat to cross-strait peace are separatist activities and U.S. conniving support. Taiwan question is core interest and most important red line in China-U.S. relations

statements.speaker: Chinese Foreign Ministry
statements.context: Official announcement
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Decision to impose countermeasures against nine U.S. military companies (Sierra Nevada Corporation, Stick Rudder Enterprises LLC, Cubic Corporation, S3 AeroDefense, TCOM Limited Partnership, TextOre, Planate Management Group, ACT1 Federal and Exovera) for arms sales to Taiwan: freeze all property in China, prohibit Chinese organizations and individuals from engaging in transactions or cooperation with these enterprises, effective September 18, 2024

article_title: Xi Extols the Superiority of the People's Congress System

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Speech at Great Hall of the People marking 70th anniversary of National People's Congress
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Democracy is a common value of all mankind. The great achievements made by the Chinese people under the leadership of the Communist Party of China in developing people's democracy have enriched global democratic theory and practice, and contributed Chinese wisdom and solutions. We should draw on the beneficial achievements of human political civilization, but we must not simply copy Western political systems. We are willing to continue exploring with all countries and peoples around the world who pursue peace, development, fairness, justice, democracy, and freedom, to jointly explore paths for achieving broad, genuine, and effective democracy.

article_title: CMC on Studying Political Army Building in New Era - Wang's Global South Message at BRICS Meet - Li Qiang's Saudi Visit

statements.speaker: Central Military Commission (CMC)
statements.context: Official directive published in People's Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Called to carefully organize the study and use of Xi Jinping's discourses on political building of the armed forces, incorporating the collection into party committee theoretical study sessions, troop ideological and political education, and military academy political theory teaching. Theory workers should thoroughly study Xi's important expositions on political army building in the new era.

statements.speaker: Li Qiang
statements.context: Visit to Saudi Arabia, statements to Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman and Saudi business community
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China and Saudi Arabia have maintained mutual respect, trust, and benefit. China is willing to work closely with Saudi Arabia on development and advance together on the path of development. China is pushing forward digital, intelligent, and green transformation and will further relax market access and fully lift restrictions on foreign investment in the manufacturing sector.

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: BRICS National Security Advisors meeting
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: In the face of current security challenges, BRICS should adopt a long-term perspective, demonstrate a more open attitude, and cooperate more closely. BRICS should be implementers of peaceful coexistence, builders of multilateralism, promoters of political settlement, and defenders of fairness and justice. Reject exceptionalism and double standards. China stands ready to work with BRICS partners to fully implement the Global Security Initiative.

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: BRICS Counter-Terrorism Working Group and Cybersecurity Working Group meeting
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Adhere to correct principles and resist double standards and politicization of counter-terrorism issues. Support UN in central coordinating role. China affirms Counter-Terrorism and Cybersecurity Working Group results and is willing to implement BRICS Counter-Terrorism Strategy and Action Plan. Invites BRICS counter-terrorism officials to visit Xinjiang. Promotes implementation of Global Security Initiative, Global Data Security Initiative, and Global Artificial Intelligence Governance Initiative.

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: Meeting with Egyptian National Security Council Secretary General
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China is ready to collaborate with Egypt and other BRICS partners to steadily advance greater BRICS cooperation and defend international fairness and justice. Both sides committed to working together on Gaza conflict and Ukraine crisis, calling for ceasefire in Gaza and political resolution to Ukraine crisis.

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: Meeting with Serbian Deputy Prime Minister Aleksandar Vulin
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China appreciates Serbia's adherence to friendship with China and its firm support for China in safeguarding its core interests. China firmly supports Serbia in safeguarding its sovereignty, independence and territorial integrity, and will continue to uphold justice and defend justice in the international arena.

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: Meeting with Brazilian special advisor to the president Celso Amorim
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China and Brazil are vital stabilizing forces and major developing countries that will contribute more to the world's peace, stability and development. China is ready to further boost strategic collaboration with Brazil and elevate bilateral ties to new highs. Both sides expressed willingness to work with BRICS partners to make common voices and safeguard common interests.

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: BRICS security dialogue with Global South countries
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: The international security situation is becoming increasingly complex, geopolitical competition is intensifying, hotspot issues are emerging, arms race is escalating, Cold War mentality is resurfacing. The Global South should stand at the forefront, take initiative, and contribute positive energy to building a world of lasting peace and universal security. Must adhere to dialogue and cooperation, consolidate foundation for development, promote solidarity and mutual assistance, and demonstrate openness and inclusiveness. Firmly oppose all acts of hegemony, bullying, and power politics, bloc confrontation and military coercion. Resist small yards with high walls, decoupling and breaking chains, and all forms of unilateralism and protectionism.

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: BRICS security dialogue with Global South countries (continued)
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: BRICS countries and the Global South have natural emotional bonds and broad common interests. China supports BRICS opening its doors to seek development and opening its arms to promote cooperation. Welcome more like-minded southern partners to join BRICS family to jointly become a stabilizing force for maintaining peace, a backbone force for open development, a constructive force for global governance, and a promoting force for mutual learning among civilizations.
statements.topic: BRICS expansion, international cooperation, global governance

statements.speaker: Wang Xiaohong
statements.context: Third China-Pacific Island Countries Ministerial Dialogue on Law Enforcement Capabilities and Police Cooperation in Fuzhou
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China is ready to work together with all parties to focus on establishing friendlier cooperative relationships, adopting more efficient modes of cooperation, and building a more professional law enforcement team. Called for writing a new chapter of mutually beneficial law-enforcement and security cooperation to promote construction of a closer community with a shared future between China and Pacific Island countries.

statements.speaker: Ding Xuexiang
statements.context: Third Belt and Road High-Level Conference on Intellectual Property
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Efforts should be made to support high-quality IP creation, implement international sci-tech cooperation initiatives, advance sharing of data and information resources, and improve quality and efficiency of IP examination. Joint efforts needed to implement high-level IP protection, crack down on infringement activities, promote mutual recognition of geographical indications, and create favorable environment for innovation. China is committed to promoting efficient global IP governance, adhering to true multilateralism, and encouraging global IP governance system to progress in a fairer and more reasonable way.
statements.topic: intellectual property, technology cooperation, international governance

statements.speaker: Zhao Leji
statements.speaker_title: Chairman of the National People's Congress Standing Committee
statements.context: Lawmakers' symposium on the sidelines of NPC Standing Committee session
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: The People's Congress system has strong vitality and remarkable advantages because it is deeply rooted among the people. Deputies are elected through democratic processes, come from among the people, and faithfully represent the interests and will of the people. Since the 18th Party Congress, the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core has placed great emphasis on the role of deputies and comprehensively strengthened leadership over deputy work.

article_title: Building an Education Power - Delaying Retirement Age - China-Norway Green Dialogue - China-Central Asia Internal Affairs Ministers Meeting - Wang Yi Meets Shoigu - China's Support for Russia's War

statements.speaker: Ministry of Commerce
statements.context: Official statement on EU anti-subsidy case involving Chinese electric vehicles
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China is willing to continue to work closely with the EU to reach an early solution that meets the common interests of both sides and conforms to WTO rules, so as to promote the sound and steady development of China-EU economic and trade relations

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: Meeting with Russian Security Council Secretary Sergei Shoigu
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China is willing to strengthen strategic communication with Russia, give full play to the role of the China-Russia strategic security consultation mechanism and the BRICS Meeting of High Representatives on National Security mechanism, and continuously enrich the strategic connotations of China-Russia relations

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: Meeting with Russian Security Council Secretary Sergei Shoigu
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China supports Russia's work as the rotating chair of BRICS and is willing to join hands to deepen mutual trust and cooperation among BRICS countries, to shape the BRICS mechanism into a major channel for emerging powers to make their voices heard and an important platform for solidarity and cooperation of the 'Global South'

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: Meeting with Russian Security Council Secretary Sergei Shoigu
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China has always maintained an objective and fair attitude on the Ukraine issue and will continue to commit to increasing the voice of balance, objectivity, and rationality in the international community, to gather more international consensus and accumulate necessary conditions for an early ceasefire and a political resolution to the crisis

article_title: Xi Meets Prime Ministers of Spain & Norway - Lianyungang Forum - China's SCO Agenda - China-Russia Drills - China-US Commercial & Trade Working Group Meeting

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez, reported in People's Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Reform and opening up is a correct development path that China has found through long-term practice, and will be pursued steadfastly. China appreciates Spain's active promotion of China-EU exchanges and cooperation. China is ready to work with EU to review successful experience in bilateral relations and further promote them. China hopes Spain will continue to play a constructive role.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez, reported in People's Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China hopes Spain will continue to provide a fair, equitable, safe and non-discriminatory business environment for Chinese enterprises to invest and do business in the country.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez, reported in People's Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China and Spain are both countries with a sense of responsibility and mission, and both advocate multilateralism and free trade. China is ready to expand cooperation with Spain in third-party markets in the Global South, and strengthen communication and coordination in the United Nations, the G20 and other international organizations.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Gahr Store, reported in People's Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Today's world is undergoing profound changes unseen in a century. China will continue to follow the path of peaceful development. By further deepening reform and advancing Chinese modernization, China will inject stability and certainty into a world fraught with changes and turbulence and create more opportunities for the common development of all countries.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Gahr Store, reported in People's Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China and Norway share broad consensus on maintaining world peace and security, addressing climate change, protecting biodiversity and countering other global challenges. China is ready to strengthen communication and coordination with Norway at the United Nations and on other multilateral platforms, practice true multilateralism, and promote an equal, orderly, multipolar world and an economic globalization that benefits all.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Gahr Store, reported in People's Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China hopes that Norway will play a positive role in promoting the sound development of relations between China and Europe.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un on DPRK's 76th founding anniversary, reported in People's Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China will continue to view bilateral relations from a strategic and long-term perspective, and is willing to deepen strategic communication, strengthen coordination and cooperation with the DPRK, and jointly maintain, consolidate and develop traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

statements.speaker: Li Qiang
statements.context: Meeting with Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez, reported in People's Daily/Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China is willing to expand two-way opening up with Spain, encourage the development of cross-border e-commerce and convenient logistics, and promote the optimization and development of bilateral trade and investment cooperation. China will provide more facilitation and support for Spanish and other foreign enterprises to invest in China, and hopes that Spain will provide a fair, safe, non-discriminatory and predictable business environment for Chinese enterprises keen to invest in Spain.

statements.speaker: Li Qiang
statements.context: Meeting with Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez, reported in People's Daily/Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China stands ready to work with Spain to uphold openness and cooperation, safeguard the multilateral trading system with the World Trade Organization at its core, maintain stability and unimpeded global industrial and supply chains, and jointly build an open world economy.

statements.speaker: Cai Qi
statements.context: Meeting with visiting delegation from Singapore led by Foreign Minister Vivian Balakrishnan, reported in People's Daily/Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China is willing to work with Singapore to implement the important consensus reached by the leaders of the two countries and deepen comprehensive, high-quality and future-oriented cooperation. China expressed the hope that the two parties will maintain close strategic communication, deepen mutual learning and exchanges, serve the modernization of both countries, and promote the formation of an Asia-Pacific community with a shared future.

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: Meeting with Singapore Foreign Minister Vivian Balakrishnan, reported in People's Daily/Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China is ready to strengthen synergy with Singapore in the development strategies, put into practice the all-round high-quality future-oriented partnership established by the leaders of the two countries, and make new contributions to regional peace, stability and development. The two sides should give full play to dialogue mechanisms at all levels and in all fields, make good use of their mutual visa exemption policy, and deepen the construction of a China-ASEAN community with a shared future.

statements.speaker: Wang Yi
statements.context: Meeting with Singapore Foreign Minister Vivian Balakrishnan, reported in People's Daily/Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: The two sides should pool greater joint forces and inject sustained impetus into regional integration and economic globalization.

statements.speaker: Wang Xiaohong
statements.context: Speech at Global Public Security Cooperation Forum in Lianyungang, reported in People's Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China is willing to work with countries around the world to practice common, comprehensive, cooperative and sustainable security concepts, and deepen exchanges and cooperation in the field of public security. The country will work with other countries to promote the development of the global public security governance system in a fairer, more rational and more efficient direction.

statements.speaker: Sun Weidong
statements.context: Remarks as China took over as chair of the SCO, reported in People's Daily/China Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: As a rotating chair, China is ready to continue to work with other members to improve the SCO mechanism in addressing security challenges, fighting the three forces of terrorism, separatism and extremism, and combating illicit drug trafficking as well as cyber and cross-border organized crime.

statements.speaker: Sun Weidong
statements.context: Remarks as China took over as chair of the SCO, reported in People's Daily/China Daily
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China will intensify SCO pragmatic cooperation in trade, financing, energy, green development and the digital economy, and build synergy among the high-quality Belt and Road cooperation, regional cooperation initiatives and national development strategies.
statements.topic: trade, regional cooperation, Belt and Road

statements.speaker: Ministry of Commerce
statements.context: Statement on China-US commercial and trade working group vice-ministerial meeting in Tianjin, reported via Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: The Chinese side expressed concerns regarding the U.S. Section 301 tariffs, the Section 301 investigation into China's shipbuilding and other sectors, the overstretching of the concept of national security, sanctions on Chinese companies, restrictions on bilateral investments, the U.S. trade remedies against China, and unfair treatment of Chinese firms in the United States.

statements.speaker: Ministry of Commerce
statements.context: Statement on China-US commercial and trade working group vice-ministerial meeting in Tianjin, reported via Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: The Chinese side emphasized that clarifying the boundaries of national security in economic and trade matters would help stabilize business cooperation expectations. It opposes using claims of 'overcapacity' as a pretext for imposing trade and investment restrictions.

statements.speaker: Ministry of Commerce
statements.context: Statement on China-US commercial and trade working group vice-ministerial meeting in Tianjin, reported via Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Both sides have agreed to provide necessary support for trade and investment promotion activities hosted by both countries, maintain communications in areas such as cross-border data flows, inspection and quarantine, healthcare and women's health, medical devices as well as clean energy, and continue to facilitate cooperation between Chinese and U.S. businesses by establishing more project offices. They also aim to strengthen collaboration within frameworks such as the Group of 20 and Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation.

statements.speaker: Ministry of Commerce
statements.context: Statement on Netherlands export controls on semiconductors, reported via Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: To maintain its global hegemony, the United States has been constantly generalizing the concept of national security and coercing certain countries to tighten export control measures on semiconductors and equipment, which has seriously threatened the stability of the global semiconductor industrial and supply chains and undermined the legitimate rights and interests of relevant countries and enterprises. China firmly opposes this.

statements.speaker: Ministry of Commerce
statements.context: Statement on Netherlands export controls on semiconductors, reported via Xinhua
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: The Dutch side should keep in mind international economic and trade rules and the overall situation of Sino-Dutch economic and trade cooperation. They should respect market principles and the spirit of contract, and avoid relevant measures that hinder the normal cooperation and development of the semiconductor industry of the two countries. China urges the Netherlands not to abuse export control measures on semiconductor products and to earnestly safeguard the common interests of Chinese and Dutch enterprises while maintaining the stability of the global semiconductor industry and supply chains.

article_title: Joint Statement on GDI - China-Congo Joint Statement - Xi Meets More African Leaders

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with President of the Republic of Congo Denis Sassou Nguesso at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China will work with the Republic of Congo to better play their leading role as FOCAC co-chairs and to show the firm resolve of China and Africa to jointly build an all-weather community with a shared future for the new era.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with President of the Republic of Congo Denis Sassou Nguesso at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China appreciates the firm and clear support given by the Congolese side on all issues concerning China's core interests and major concerns, and is willing to deepen exchanges of experience in national governance with the Congolese side, strengthen exchanges in all fields and at all levels.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Somali President Hassan Sheikh Mohamud at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: Both China and Somalia shoulder the historical mission of achieving complete national reunification. China supports Somalia in safeguarding its national sovereignty and territorial integrity and supports Somalia's peace and development process.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Burundian President Evariste Ndayishimiye at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China supports Burundi in opposing external interference and taking an independent development path. China is willing to continue to firmly support each other on issues involving each other's core interests and major concerns.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Liberian President Joseph Nyumah Boakai at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China appreciates President Boakai's adherence to the one-China principle and is willing to strengthen exchanges and dialogues with Liberia, support each other on issues involving each other's core interests and major concerns, and safeguard national sovereignty, security and development interests.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Chairman of Sudan's Sovereignty Council Abdel Fattah Al-Burhan at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China is concerned about the current development of the situation in Sudan and supports Sudan in safeguarding its national sovereignty, independence and territorial integrity. China will continue to uphold justice for its Sudanese friends at multilateral forums, such as the United Nations.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with President of Madagascar Andry Nirina Rajoelina at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China supports Madagascar in independently exploring a path of modernization that suits its national conditions, and is willing to strengthen exchanges and cooperation with Madagascar, expand pragmatic cooperation.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with Gambian President Adama Barrow at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: The two sides should continue to firmly support each other on issues involving each other's core interests and major concerns. China will continue to send medical teams to the Gambia, support the development of Chinese education in The Gambia, encourage more Gambian youth to come to China for exchanges.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with President of the Central African Republic Faustin-Archange Touadera at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China appreciates CAR's support on issues concerning China's core interests, and will continue to support CAR's efforts to safeguard national independence, security and stability. China is willing to strengthen exchanges of experience in governance with CAR.

statements.speaker: Xi Jinping
statements.context: Meeting with South Sudanese President Salva Kiir at FOCAC summit
statements.quote_or_paraphrase: China supports South Sudan in steadily advancing its political transition process, opposes external forces interfering in South Sudan's internal affairs, supports the South Sudanese people in taking their future and destiny into their own hands.
